localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

nodes.excerpt: Create a micro website for free. Instantly get a QR code or link to share. Have customers can a QR code at your restaurant table, share a link to your professional info or product catalog, have window shopping with QR codes, or anything you can think of.
nodes.title: Stacky - Create micro-websites. Instantly get a link and QR code.
nodes.author: Pablo Neirotti

nodes.excerpt: Bring a company to watch memes or learn new things on YouTube, listen to music on SoundCloud, or just play your favorite videos from anywhere. Built-in YouTube features (search, related videos, trends, video info)
nodes.title: Watchpubs - Chat rooms for watching YouTube videos with others
nodes.author: Lennart Le

nodes.excerpt: Meritocratic music platform where the best music gets exposure not the best marketed music. As you rank songs you impact the elo ratings of songs which impacts how many other users see them. We also learn what you like and generate you custom playlists!
nodes.title: LaunchSong - Rank songs to discover the best underground music
nodes.author: Jonah Livingston

nodes.excerpt: Emolog is easy to use! Select your emoji to sum up your day and record it, simple as that! You can fill in your diary as much as you want! If you donâ€™t feel like it, just leave a title. You can also record your precious emotions within just a few seconds!
nodes.title: Emolog - Record your daily emotions using emojis
nodes.author: Robin

nodes.excerpt: Wozi helps you satisfy your sweet tooth with healthy foods you otherwise may not have enjoyed. It is a natural flavor enhancer that makes sour foods taste sweet, reduces their bitterness, and amplifies their flavor. Start healthier habits in just 30 seconds.
nodes.title: Wozi - Your cheat code to making healthy food taste delicious
nodes.author: Chris Messina

nodes.excerpt: We are the worldâ€™s first hashtag NFT. Instead of selling pre-designed art, we commission designers to craft something unique to represent every hashtag minted. Proof of Culture is the first major NFT project to enable customized art on the blockchain at scale.
nodes.title: HASHTAG NFTs by Proof of Culture - Preserve modern culture with the worldâ€™s first Hashtag NFT!
nodes.author: Chris Messina

nodes.excerpt: Brig Note is your personal note-taking tool, combines recording and typing in an effective way. It gives you the possibility to record your voice during your lecture or any other kind of speech or event and taking notes over recording.
nodes.title: Brig Note - Take notes over voice recordings
nodes.author: Jim Raptis

With Khuro, you can - Easily choose which friends and friend groups see your posts. - Share photos with your friends. - Post your availability, plans, and thoughts.

nodes.excerpt: Crab Fit helps you fit your event around everyone's schedules. Simply create an event above and send the link to everyone that is participating. Results update live and you will be able to see a heat-map of when everyone is free.
nodes.title: Crab Fit - Use your availability to find a time that works for everyone
nodes.author: Ben Grant

nodes.excerpt: AiCam turns old phone into an advanced tool to protect your home, your beloved ones and your pet. AiCam has smart alerts based on AI event detection, which runs offline to ensure complete data privacy. The app has recently gone live in Apple App Store.
nodes.title: AiCam - Smart home security with full data privacy

nodes.excerpt: Path is a simple and free app that will help you put your decisions into context and make them more manageable. Use it to visualise the impact of each option on the parts of your life that are most important.
nodes.title: Path - A free iOS & macOS app for visualising difficult decisions
nodes.author: Cristian Moisei

nodes.excerpt: Vemari helps book creators unlock the value of their book notes. With Vemari, creators can write book notes, group those book notes into relevant themes, and share their book notes, via subscription or free, to their book circle.
nodes.title: Vemari - Helping creators monetize their book notes
nodes.author: Nana Adom Mills Robertson
